comment: This class wasn't hard you just have to stay on top of everything. It was so quick and assignment heavy but there were extra credit opportunities as well. You definitely need to put time into this class. But otherwise it was not difficult just time consuming. No shortcuts really.

DO NOT TAKE HER ONLINE CLASS. I received A's in every single grade (quizzes, tests, extra tests) and missed TWO discussion posts, and received a D IN THIS CLASS. I'm sorry, but that is just ridiculous. I am highly disappointed in the lack of lectures; all I did was read the book and take the quizzes. I am a diligent student and never expected this
3 big/confusing individual projects, 1 huge group project, and homework weekly. Try to take a different professor.

Dr. Murray cares greatly about her students! Very accessible outside of class - answers emails quickly. Very clear assignments and she is a quick grader. Class format is crystal clear; weekly assignments are posted from the first day of class. There is a midterm and a final. Dr. Murray gives extra credit assignments too in case you need it later.

Took online during the summer* Super easy 1 month 3 credit course. 4 weeks long with about 1-2 hours of HW every week. No reading required. Group Project is easy depending on your group and tests are 60 questions long and a breeze. No final and the last week we had minimal homework

I underestimated this course. Tests were challenging - not impossible though. Emailing her your assignments AHEAD of time will SAVE your grade because they are 20%. She gives very detailed feedback & basically tells you how to get an A. Started out struggling but ended up with an A once I asked for help. Overall she was very fair and helpful.

Expectations and Syllabus are clear. Tough class. Lots of material. If you don't get it the emaildiscussion format can be a challenge. I found that her email responses also often took a day or two to come back which means that you can't wait until the 11th hour to do the weekly assignments.

Sticks to her syllabus, Sends D2L reminders of upcoming due dates, Perfectly articulate in her description of  assignments, Responds very quickly to email, Super-smart, totally knows her industry, and obviously loves what she does.
Very easy class! Only two tests (midterm and final) and can use textbook on the final. Easy assignments and very nice professor. Responds to emails very quickly. Easy A!

She is extremely clear about what she expects from you. I took this class online and she has been nothing but helpful. She responds to e-mails extremely quickly and knows what she is doing. She is also very knowledgeable about the subject. Honestly, I admire the her. Just do the work and you can use the book on tests.
I took this class online, it was super easy and straight forward.  I would recommend!
Great Prof!Highly Recommend.
This professor is amazing! She is crystal clear, uses real world examples to help you understand, and is always willing to help. Great class. (She's not bad to look at either). One of KSU's best!!!!

Took the online class.  Anyone can get an A.  Lots of weekly work (quizzes, trainings, etc.), but it will be that way with any professor in this particular class.  Do the work, get a good grade.  Professor quickly and clearly responded to emails.

GOOD: Gives great feedback, generous with assignment credit, quick response on e-mails, knowledgeable in regard to the course material, gives lots of resources to help students. BAD: Gave a project in Access when the primary tool taught in class was oracle. Gave resources to help learn access but did not require them to be reviewed for a grade.

Very nice lady and she is very familiar with the subject.  She almost seemed bored teaching it until somebody asked a question.  All of the assignments were easy, and she was very open to having assignments (and even test questions) completed in a different way so long as you could justify it and still be correct.
Great Professor! Very passionate. Very Helpful and Knowledgable. Microsoft Certified. Goes out of the way to help those in trouble!

She is wonderful! I know many in my class found her boring but I thought the lectures were wonderful. She's a great professor. She's very intelligent and easily communicates the subject to students. Take her ... you won't regret it.
Dr. Murray is by far the best IS teacher in the department. Extremely helpfull. Go to class you will want to.

If u r taking 4555...just take her & u wnt regret it at all. Treats u like an adult, very clear and works on what the class decides. Very very interactive, fun & stress free class. Just remember to start your work on time, finish it & submit it...u'll be fine~!

Puts powerpoints on webct, so you just have to make your quiz/test notes from that. Tests require ALOT of study, but half of it isn't on the test. The material is boring, and you can tell she tries her best to make it fun but... just no. She's nice, but doesn't seem interested in impressing her students. Overall, it's a decent class.
by far the best at KSU, classes are difficult and she is demanding, but you learn alot, not the typical waste of time you find in many other CSIS classes. Only take if you want to learn!
Although not an easy course or instructor, very clear and helpful
